org.coniks.coniks_server

Class ServerUtils.Record

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.coniks.coniks_server.ServerUtils.Record
  • Enclosing class:
    ServerUtils

    public static class ServerUtils.Record
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a link in the hash chain of signed tree roots that forms the server's history.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ServerUtils.Record(RootNode r, long ep, byte[] str, ServerUtils.Record p)
      Constructs a hash chain record containing the RootNode r, the STR str, and the previous link in the chain p for epoch ep.

    • Method Summary
